message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies-v3_%28mariano%29.pdf: Página 26
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work
26
COMMON NOTIONS: TIME ZONES
Time zones. The time in different places of the world.
Phillips A, Sasaki F, Davis M, Dürst M (2005) Working with Time Zones. W3C Working Group 
Note (http://www.w3.org/TR/2005/NOTE-timezone-20051013/)
The axiomatization of time zones is complex. Thus, for example, the Northern and Southern hemispheres 
perform Daylight/Summer Time adjustments during opposing times during the year (corresponding to 
seasonal differences in the two hemispheres)
http://www.tagoror.com/enciclopedia/es/media/4/4b/timezones.png
speaker: SYSTEM
